name: GaugeStyleConfiguration
desc: The properties of a gauge instance.

items.name: var label: GaugeStyleConfiguration.Label
items.desc: A view that describes the purpose of the gauge.

items.name: struct Label
items.desc: A type-erased label of a gauge, describing its purpose.

items.name: var minimumValueLabel: GaugeStyleConfiguration.MinimumValueLabel?
items.desc: A view that describes the minimum of the range for the current value.

items.name: struct MinimumValueLabel
items.desc: A type-erased value label of a gauge describing the minimum value.

items.name: var maximumValueLabel: GaugeStyleConfiguration.MaximumValueLabel?
items.desc: A view that describes the maximum of the range for the current value.

items.name: struct MaximumValueLabel
items.desc: A type-erased value label of a gauge describing the maximum value.

items.name: var value: Double
items.desc: The current value of the gauge.

items.name: var currentValueLabel: GaugeStyleConfiguration.CurrentValueLabel?
items.desc: A view that describes the current value.

items.name: struct CurrentValueLabel
items.desc: A type-erased value label of a gauge that contains the current value.

items.name: struct MarkedValueLabel
items.desc: A type-erased label describing a specific value of a gauge.
